reviewText:
These are the best videos for children.  My son absolutely loves Arthur.
We like the values that the author (Arthur) imparts to children.
Nice clean videos.
My son compares the book to the video and says the video is wrong, "based on the book."  too funny
The darn DVD case was broken!! Good show Until my daughter stepped on the DVD and broke it.
music and dialogue helps strengthen his speech and language deficiency.  It really helped soothed his mind and he enjoyed it very much.  He really loves Arthur episodes!
I use this with k-2 when there is a sub in my music class.  They love it! Keeps their attention and they learn a little about music as well.
Nice dvd, and arrived in good shape!

The episodes available are "Arthur Plays the Blues/Buster's Sweet Success", "My Music Rules/That's a Baby Show", "Arthur vs. the Piano/The Big Blow Up" and "Muffy's Soccer Shocker/Brother Can You Spare a Clarinet?"

Eight episodes for the kiddos, and the season six episodes are the syndication versions with Mark Rendall as Arthur. This DVD is a great one to get your kids into "Arthur"
Students love this on a snowy day.
My son loves this no more borrowing from the library
Product was OK .Not the best video quality
